name: The High
description:
Skye is a young NonBinary Lizardman about to begin a new highschool.

He is ready to make new friends and have fun.

A completely 100% PG-13 short RPG I want to turn into a series.

This game is related to Quarticore Cataclysm, Its not needed to play it but if you want to go deeper into the story of the game's world then you should play it:

https://destructhebox.itch.io/quarticore-cataclysm

The short DEMO dosen't have many art because I don't have many time for that.
